description: Graduate core course and capstone option, CAE-Operations and CAE-Defense certified. Serves 100-120 students per academic year. Enhanced curriculum with comprehensive code review methodologies, offensive security testing, and advanced cryptography including zero-knowledge proofs. Developed new exam series, modernized hands-on labs, and created study guides aligned with industry security frameworks (OWASP, MITRE ATT&CK, NIST SSDF).

Graduate networking course with CAE-Operations and CAE-Defense certification, serving 30-45 students per academic year. Developed new lecture series on secure network protocols, enhanced labs with real-world attack scenarios, and integrated modern SDN/NFV concepts. Created comprehensive assessment framework and hands-on exercises using industry-standard tools.
